sentences.en: ‘Are you coming with me?’ ‘No fear—it's too exciting here.’.
sentences.cn: “你要和我一块去吗？”“当然不——这儿真够劲。”。

sentences.en: a fear of flying
sentences.cn: 害怕坐飞机

sentences.en: Emergency workers fear that the burning ship could slip its moorings.
sentences.cn: 急救人员担心燃烧着的船只可能会脱链滑走。

sentences.en: Fearing violence, the group asked for police protection.
sentences.cn: 该团体担心发生暴力事件，所以请求警方保护。

sentences.en: He stared at his favourite child, dismayed, filled with fear.
sentences.cn: 他惊愕地盯着自己最宠爱的孩子，满心恐惧。

sentences.en: His mind was a haze of fear and confusion.
sentences.cn: 由于害怕和困惑，他当时处于一种混沌状态。

sentences.en: I fear that a land war now looks very probable.
sentences.cn: 恐怕陆地战爆发的可能性很大。

sentences.en: I was sitting on the floor shivering with fear because a bullet had been fired through a window.
sentences.cn: 我坐在地板上吓得浑身发抖，因为有一颗子弹射穿窗户打了进来。

sentences.en: I would overcome any weakness, any despair, any fear.
sentences.cn: 我要克服所有的软弱、绝望和恐惧。

sentences.en: Ignorance of people brings fear, fear of the unknown.
sentences.cn: 人们的无知会带来恐惧，对未知事物的恐惧。

sentences.en: Mack made his voice quiver with fear on these last two words.
sentences.cn: 麦克说出最后这两个字时，吓得声音颤抖。

sentences.en: no one dared refuse the order for fear of losing their job.
sentences.cn: 没人敢违抗命令，以免失业。

sentences.en: Oil majors need not fear being unable to sell their crude.
sentences.cn: 大型石油公司无需担心原油销售不出去。

sentences.en: People don'tlike to ask questions for fear of appearing ignorant.
sentences.cn: 人们不喜欢问问题，害怕自己会显得很无知。

sentences.en: She finally ran away for fear that he would kill her.
sentences.cn: 她最后逃走了，唯恐他会杀她。

sentences.en: take all your decisions without fear or favour.
sentences.cn: 公正地作出你所有的决定。

sentences.en: The fear is that science could become the handmaiden of industry.
sentences.cn: 人们担心的是科学会成为工业的仆人。

sentences.en: The motive of the executions would be to instil fear.
sentences.cn: 执行死刑的动机是要灌输恐惧。

sentences.en: Their luck had simply run out. Still, never fear.
sentences.cn: 他们的好运已经到头了。不过，别担心。

sentences.en: There was no fear that anything would be misunderstood.
sentences.cn: 并无引起误会的可能性。

sentences.en: we shall meet again, never fear.
sentences.cn: 我们还会见面的，别担心。

sentences.en: When events happen that shake these beliefs, our fear takes control.
sentences.cn: 当一些事情的发生动摇这些信念时，恐惧就会占据我们的心灵。

sentences.en: You can't put that sort of fear into words.
sentences.cn: 那种恐惧无法用语言表达。
